title: 281-A
statement: A. Word Capitalizationtime limit per test2 secondsmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstdinoutputstdoutCapitalization is writing a word with its first letter as a capital letter. Your task is to capitalize the given word.Note, that during capitalization all the letters except the first one remains unchanged.InputA single line contains a non-empty word. This word consists of lowercase and uppercase English letters. The length of the word will not exceed103.OutputOutput the given word after capitalization.ExamplesInputApPLeOutputApPLeInputkonjacOutputKonjac
